name: s-private
author: s-hirano-ist
description: Private pages and admin tools for s-hirano-ist.

scripts.license:summary:
echo '=== Root dependencies ===' > library-license.txt && license-checker-rseidelsohn --start . --summary >> library-license.txt && echo '
=== App package ===' >> library-license.txt && license-checker-rseidelsohn --start ./app --summary >> library-license.txt && echo '
=== UI package ===' >> library-license.txt && license-checker-rseidelsohn --start ./packages/ui --summary >> library-license.txt && echo '
=== Core package ===' >> library-license.txt && license-checker-rseidelsohn --start ./packages/core --summary >> library-license.txt
scripts.license:check:
license-checker-rseidelsohn --start . --failOn 'GPL;GPL-2.0;GPL-3.0;LGPL;LGPL-3.0' && license-checker-rseidelsohn --start ./app --failOn 'GPL;GPL-2.0;GPL-3.0;LGPL;LGPL-3.0' && license-checker-rseidelsohn --start ./packages/ui --failOn 'GPL;GPL-2.0;GPL-3.0;LGPL;LGPL-3.0' && license-checker-rseidelsohn --start ./packages/core --failOn 'GPL;GPL-2.0;GPL-3.0;LGPL;LGPL-3.0' || (echo '
=== ERROR: Forbidden licenses detected ===' && echo '
=== Root package details ===' && license-checker-rseidelsohn --start . --csv && echo '
=== App package details ===' && license-checker-rseidelsohn --start ./app --csv && echo '
=== UI package details ===' && license-checker-rseidelsohn --start ./packages/ui --csv && echo '
=== Core package details ===' && license-checker-rseidelsohn --start ./packages/core --csv && exit 1)
scripts.deps:circular: depcruise app/src packages/ui packages/core packages/notification --config .dependency-cruiser.cjs --output-type text --focus-depth 0
scripts.deps:graph: depcruise app/src packages/ui packages/core packages/notification --config .dependency-cruiser.cjs --output-type dot | dot -T svg > dependency-graph.svg
